channel.title: The Ark
channel.description: The Ark is the weekly newspaper of Tiburon, Belvedere and Strawberry

item.title: Picks of the Week: Caviar Crawl along Main Street Tiburon; Hip Service plays the hits at free concert at Community Park
item.description: The Caviar Crawl runs noon-4 p.m. July 13 along Main Street, followed by the Belvedere concert at 4 p.m.
item.dc:creator: The Ark

item.title: From prison to podium: Tiburon man finds second chance at life through running
item.description: Markelle Taylor began running in 2015 while incarcerated at San Quentin Rehabilitation Center, where he was quickly dubbed “Markelle The Gazelle.”
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Tiburon fire budget plans for Paradise Drive station remodel to start in August
item.description: The remodel of Station 10 on Paradise Drive at Trestle Glen Boulevard accounts for about 22% of the district’s total anticipated expenditures in fiscal 2026.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: NASA ember-risk maps show threats to Tiburon homes
item.description: New satellite data highlights areas where vegetation could fuel spot fires; agencies promote defensible space to minimize risks
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Strawberry rec district plans for deficit to finance new playground
item.description: The district aims to have the new playground complete by summer 2026.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Tiburon teen helps row youth four boat to national title
item.description: Marin finished the championship race with a time of 7:04.67, defeating second-place Connecticut by nearly five seconds.
item.dc:creator: Kevin Hessel
